readable.title: 2667783499_3a4f38f636
readable.content: A small boy in blue crawls along a window sill . A small child crawling on a windowsill . Little boy with blue shirt crawls across vents near large glass windows . The little boy crawls around next to the large glass windows . This picture shows a boy in a blue shirt leaning his head against a window with lots of beautiful clowds outside .
